traits.locale_text: Tactical Knowledge requires 3 clues instead of 4. The Adept's damage is increased by +(INT bonus).

languages.text: {g|f:2a417cde46674ae0a5da8dcfd9ec621d}战术知识{/g}不再需要4层{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果，只需要3层研究效果即可生效。当效果生效时，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|BonusDamage|45e2c72d4698481e9185fb922044496c}%。
